comments.comment: It is not just documentation, the LBSGD optimizer has bugs as mentioned at the bottom of this PR - <denchmark-link:https://github.com/apache/incubator-mxnet/pull/8918#pullrequestreview-92318451>#8918 (review)</denchmark-link> and they are still not all addressed. <denchmark-link:https://github.com/mxnet-label-bot>@mxnet-label-bot</denchmark-link> [Optimizer, Bug]

<denchmark-link:https://github.com/eric-haibin-lin>@eric-haibin-lin</denchmark-link> is this still an issue? I'm not seeing anything particularly unusual with the current output: <denchmark-link:https://mxnet.incubator.apache.org/api/python/optimization/optimization.html?highlight=lbsgd#mxnet.optimizer.LBSGD>https://mxnet.incubator.apache.org/api/python/optimization/optimization.html?highlight=lbsgd#mxnet.optimizer.LBSGD</denchmark-link>
